Uses of Interface
org.voltdb.client.ProcedureCallback

  • Packages that use ProcedureCallback 
    Package Description
    org.voltdb.client
    Package containing code specific to the VoltDB Java Client Driver.

    • Uses of ProcedureCallback in org.voltdb.client

      Classes in org.voltdb.client that implement ProcedureCallback 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NullCallback
      A utility callback that can be instantiated for asynchronous invocations where the result including success/failure is going to be ignored.
      class  SyncCallback
      A utility class that allows a client to queue a stored procedure invocation asynchronously and then poll or join on the response.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Deprecated.

      Asynchronously invoke a replicated procedure.

      Deprecated. 
       
      void ClientStatusListenerExt.uncaughtException(ProcedureCallback callback, ClientResponse r, Throwable e)
      Called when a clientCallback(ClientResponse) invocation throws an exception.
      boolean Client.updateApplicationCatalog(ProcedureCallback callback, File catalogPath, File deploymentPath)
      Asynchronously invokes UpdateApplicationCatalog procedure.
